mapper.select: SELECT bpgc.id, bpg.pg_name, bpg.`code`, bpg.create_user_id, su1.real_name as '项目创建人', bpgc.check_status, sdd.dic_content as '审核状态', bpgc.check_time, bpgc.check_user_id, su.real_name as '审核人', bpgc.remark FROM ba_project_group_check bpgc left join ba_project_group bpg on bpgc.pg_id = bpg.id left join sys_user su on su.id = bpgc.check_user_id left join sys_user su1 on su1.id = bpg.create_user_id left join sys_data_dic sdd on sdd.dic_code = bpgc.check_status
